name: Zoroark Pokemon Showdown Style
description: This style will not work correctly on screens that are too small! I wanted to do something different with this style, and for people with small screens, as I said it won't work correctly. If you have a question ask them bellow, and don't forget to drop a thumbs up on the style! If you wish to have a conversation with me or ask questions more in depth, contact me on a Pokemon Showdown server such as Origin. THIS STYLE WAS FIXED AND SHOULD BE FULLY FUNCTIONAL
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates/Fixes:

    17ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - fixed the MegaEvo input label.
      - removed maintabbarbottom's shadow.
      - buttons patern + hover fixed.
      - set .battle-controls .whatdo's color to white.

    20ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - fixed the imgur bug.

    21ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - added broadcast css

    1ˢᵗ May 2015:
      - .highlighted fixed

    3ʳᵈ May 2015:
      - .highlighted tweak
      - Added .ps-overlay

    13ᵗʰ May 2015:
      - fixed a couple of issues you would have using this skin on psim.us servers.

    27ᵗʰ June 2015:
      Pokemon Showdown made some changes/additions to their server so I had to add that in the style:
      - .mainmenufooter width fixed
      - tabbar's subtle notification color fixed
      - "Find a User" button positioned correctly.

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.
      - credits fixed.

    27ᵗʰ August 2015:
      - roomcounters fix


    28ᵗʰ August 2015:
      - battles semi-fixed


    4ᵗʰ January 2017:
      - Major fixes to battles, teambuilder and mainmenu: The CSS should now be completely functional, please report to me any errors.
